abstract: Apax Partners has been in discussions with Polycom, the largest independent videoconferencing equipment firm, about a buyout that could value the company at more than $3 billion, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: Apax Partners has been in discussions with Polycom, the largest independent videoconferencing equipment firm, about a buyout that could value the company at more than $3 billion, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Apax Partners has been in discussions with Polycom, the largest independent videoconferencing equipment firm, about a buyout that could value the company at more than $3 billion, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Apax and Polycom Said to Be in Deal Talks
